author: ncitron
content:
Hi all. Wanted to share a new light client I've been working on, Helios:
https://github.com/a16z/helios

It exposes most of the eth jsonrpc much like Kevlar

author: shresth
content: QQ <@171102499057565697> How do you do eth_call and eth_estimateGas?

author: shresth
content: Do you sequentially fetch storage slots during the local EVM simulation?

author: ncitron
content: Not quite. I first fetch an access list, then fetch state in parallel, then simulate the call (and sequentially fetch state in cases where its missing from the access list)

content: great, thats same for Kevlar
